price: Ɛmma wͻn ͻhaw (tesε tipaeε anaa yafun keka anaa adwen sεeε biara) na wͻmmoro nso.
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
